data.text:
2024 Football Roster

Choose a Player:

97 Wesley Williams

Position Defensive End

Height 6-3

Class Redshirt Sophomore

Hometown Gainesville, Va.

High School Battlefield

Bio

Related

Stats

Biography

2024: Returning defensive end … preseason All-ACC selection by Athlon Sports (4th team) … in 14 career games (3 starts), has compiled 39 tackles, 6.5 TFL, 1.5 sacks, one PBU, three QB pressures and two blocked kicks … recorded 2+ tackles on 10 occasions and 4+ tackles four times … logged a career-high seven tackles against Virginia in 2023 … posted 1.0+ TFL on five occasions, including a career-best 1.5 against Florida State in 2023 … blocked two field goals in the 2023 season opener against Clemson … has played 565 career snaps.

2023: Recipient of the team’s defensive rookie of the year award … saw action in all 13 games, making three starts against NC State, Notre Dame and Troy … compiled 39 tackles, 6.5 TFL, 1.5 sacks, one PBU, three QB pressures and two blocked kicks … notched 2+ tackles on 10 occasions and 4+ tackles four times … logged a season-high seven tackles against Virginia … registered 1.0+ TFL on five occasions, including a season-best 1.5 against Florida State … tallied a year-high 1.0 sack against the Seminoles … logged one QB pressure in contests with Clemson, North Carolina and NC State … lone PBU came against Lafayette … blocked two field goals in the season opener against Clemson to become the first Duke player to achieve the feat since Joe Giles Harris on November 3, 2018 … on the field for 553 snaps.

2022: Recipient of the team’s defensive scout team player of the year award ... played in one game against North Carolina A&T ... on the field for 12 snaps ... enrolled at Duke in January, 2022.

PRIOR TO DUKE: Lettered four seasons at Battlefield under head coach Scott Girolmo … three-star prospect by 247Sports.com and Rivals.com … charted as the No. 16 prospect from the state of Virginia according to Rivals.com… recorded 105 tackles, 32 TFL, 13.5 sacks, one INT, three forced fumbles and two TDs during senior season … helped Battlefield to a 27-13 overall record, including a state semifinal appearance as a senior … two-time first team all-district as a defensive end … also lettered two seasons in basketball, earning honorable mention honors ... following senior year, named the recipient of the 30th annual Franklin D. Watkins Memorial Award, an honor presented to the nation’s top African-American high school scholar-athlete, joining former Duke lettermen Zavier Carmichael, Rakavius Chambers, Jaylen Coleman, Matt Daniels, Mataeo Durant, Brandon Hill, Vince Oghobaase, and Deion Williams, along with current team members Jordan Moore and Michael Reese as finalists for the award.

PERSONAL: Born September 22, 2004 … majoring in public policy … son of Orson and Paula Williams … cousin, Kaleb Oliver, lettered three seasons as a defensive back at Georgia Tech (2018-19-20) and one season at Western Kentucky University (2021) … uncle, Jermaine Belin, lettered four seasons as an offensive lineman at Boise State University (1995-96-97-98), and earned All-Big West Conference honors in 1997.
